title: Bonus Episode – Cyrus Wilson
description:
September 5, 2019 / Colin reports on the case of Cyrus Wilson, who was convicted of a Nashville murder based on the testimony of three juvenile witnesses who have since recanted.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon.
 
This bonus episode was sponsored by FabFitFun, Perfect Snacks, and SimpliSafe.
 
www.FabFitFun.com coupon code UNDISCLOSED
